concept.title: Resolved Issues
concept.shortdesc: This section lists previous issues resolved by HPE Helion Eucalyptus 4.2.2.

row.entry: Issue
Description
Concurrent address allocations can fail (euca-allocate-address)
CloudFormation JSON response messages include internal properties
Failed finding service account for service: one-cc-1 error seen in log repeatedly
ELB fails to create instance per availability zone
Odd Error Returned from ModifyLoadBalancerAttributes
Warning logged when starting eucalyptus-nc
In a multi-cluster cloud, PV images can not be launched using EKI and ERI options in one AZ
PV instance migration doesn't work
Failure to multi-delete objects by non-bucket-owning accounts
Do not allow upper-case letters in bucket name and prefix in ELB access logs
Accounts can delete each others' access keys given the keys' IDs - 4.2.x
4.2 upgrade fails with error "duplicate key value violates unique constraint "uk_r165nl545vks5p0miwvks5yb9"
4.2 upgrade should handle cloud.identifier_canonicalizer property
GNI file does not add ingressRules during 4.1.x to 4.2.0 upgrade
Enable instance dns name resolution on upgrade
Entering password into "Create Image" dialog does not work on Windows/ IE11
Eucaconsole early output not captured to logfile
cloudformation.samples.bucket config can break stack wizard
Update aws instance types based on current EC2 list
Multi-object delete fails to return errors (if there are any)
Internal ELB groups not listed in rule widget
Large number of volumes breaks volumes landing page
Upload button should be hidden when uploads are disabled in console.ini
GUI can't deal with objects that are stored with // in paths
Notification has text cut off
Console error thrown after modifying attribute of stopped instance
User data not pre-populating when creating instance or launch config from existing instance.
Create Load Balancer button available without selecting required bucket
Create Bucket link in Create Load Balancer can lose user's entered parameters when uppercase letters are entered for bucket name
bundling progress should be updated from bundle task progress
Status bar looks like button on scaling group details "Instances" tab
Creating an account with 'admin' user entered prevents download of credentials
Eucaconsole does not always load the latest IE mode
ELB access logs collection fails when logs prefix contains an uppercase letter
Console does not allow an empty prefix to be entered for ELB access logs
bucket landing page: icon in tile header is too big
Credentials should not be automatically created at account creation
